titles.title: Collateral Requirements for Disaster Loans Act
Collateral Requirements for Disaster Loans Act
To adjust collateral requirements under the Small Business Act for disaster loans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary:
Collateral Requirements for Disaster Loans Act
This bill makes permanent the increased threshold limits for the minimum major-disaster loan amount for which the Small Business Administration may require collateral.
